resources.string: Copyright © 2015 Miles Industries Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
BUILD & PRICE YOUR OWN VALOR FIREPLACE

To start creating your very own Valor gas fireplace, simply choose from the 3 application types on the right. Valor offers verstaile fireplace applications for zero clearance, insert & freestanding options which means you can find a model to fit any space.
All Valor fireplaces are designed with performance as the primary objective. We take pride in providing you with a reliable, easy to control, radiant gas heater that will last for many years to come.

Tired of chopping, stacking and loading firewood in the cold? Then it’s time to add reliable warmth to your home or weekend getaway. No matter what the application, we have the freestanding stove for you.
Versatile in design, Valor stoves nestle comfortably in cold basement spaces, abandoned inglenooks and tight room corner configurations.
Looking for information about your design or selection? Find a Valor dealer in your area by entering your postal/zip code below:
